评论详情: Love this shirt and it’s very versatile. I’ve tried it on with leather pants and skirt, pencil skirt and jeans and I find it a hit every single time. Do size up, as it does run small, but it’s a great purchase.
Me encanto

评论概述: Fits great, lining makes it NOT see through
评论详情: I'm busy and so many button up shirts stretch over my ample bosoms. This blouse fit so well and the lining gives me some security that my underclothes aren't visible. It is so soft and good quality. The color is gorgeous and I love the fancy pearl buttons. I'm 5'6" and weigh about 170lbs, with a DD cup size and an 8 for great. I feel like the next size up would have been just a little too baggy for my purposes, but would still fit nicely if you have slightly broader shoulders than I do.

评论概述: Tight in arms and Buttons where hard to button
评论详情: The buttons were really hard to button like almost hurting my fingers to push them through the small hole. The arms were tight so it was hard to move. The detail in the blouse is really nice and I really wanted to like it, it was just too hard to move in so it wasn’t that comfortable. It didn’t have a lot of stretchiness.

评论概述: Cute, buttons way too hard and sleeves are way too short
评论详情: Cute style but the buttons are ridiculously hard to button and the sleeves are way too short to be a long sleeve shirt. If you want it to be 3/4 length sleeves, then great but this shirt is supposed to have full length sleeves.
Super cute top but definitely need to size up. Very thin material but makes for a good layering top.
Lovely shirt but runs small

I love this shirt! However I had to order 3 sizes to get the right fit. I am normally a xs/s. I ended up ordering s,m,lg. I kept the large and it is still a snug fit. It describes it as a US size 6, large. It is more like a US 2. So I'd order up at least two sizes. Once you find the right fit, this is a beautiful shirt and I love it!
Todo me gusto es muy bonita y fina.
Love love love this shirt!

评论概述: Gold and pearl buttons were a nice touch to the Victorian shirt.
评论详情: Loved the shirt, it was perfect for our murder mystery event , I had to dress Victorian .

Bought this shirt for our Christmas party that was National Lampoons Griswold Family Christmas themed! The shirt and the look was a hit but also one I can wear for nice occasions with jeans or slacks. Good quality and pretty buttons. Hope this lasts after several washes.
Will be wearing tonight to dinner at a fine dining restaurant…with a black blazer having velvet on collar and sleeve ends. Will be stunning! Highly recommended .
Love that it tapers to the waist!

评论概述: Size Up for Plus Size Peeps
评论详情: I almost got this one size up, but when I read other reviews I decided to go with the size 20 and it was the right way to go. The material is a bit stretchy so it didn't feel like it was tight or restrictive. Very cute top for what I wanted. The bottons do open up a bit, but this might be an issue for any larger busted person. The material is soft, it is a bit see through but I am wearing something over it so it will hide a darker colored bra underneath well enough. But if you are in between sizes, definitely size up! When the shirt arrived it was a "7XL" in Asia measurement sizing per the tag, vs online saying US 20.

these blouses are polyester but look pretty nice, right up until you wash them. Then the trim becomes embedded in the lace on the top portion. I'm working with dozens of these for a theatrical production and every day I have to manually cut filaments of the lace with scissors to separate it from the trim so the blouse will lie flat again. and they look worse by the day. Major design flaw.

Before wearing the first time I tried to iron out the wrinkles.  I barely touched the sleeve when the fabric as tuck to the iron creating large holes.  The blouse was very pretty, but I can't afford to replace it.

I'm about 5'2" and 110-115lbs, so I wasn't expecting much since I have a hard time finding clothes that fit nice. Things are normally slightly too big or too small. This shirt fits like it was tailored! It's also very soft. Great find!
Surprisingly great quality and great fit
This blouse is exactly what I was looking for. I like how it fits. My only concern is the material it seems like it will snag if I’m not careful. Hopefully they will make this in a cotton version.

The fabric isn’t the best but I ordered my normal size and it fit perfectly. I’m using it for a costume role and will change out the buttons to look more late 19th century. I intend to wash the first time by hand or on delicate as I am not sure how it will look until after the first washing.

评论概述: Darling shirt, but too sheer and doesn't fit.

But the shirt itself is VERY sheer.  It even has a sewn-in lining and it's still super see-through.Unfortunately, this is a deal-breaker for me.  When I buy a shirt, I only want to wear the one shirt, not an undershirt with it.Also, I'm tall (5'9"), and the fit of the shirt was alright horizontally but not vertically/longwise.  So I'm sorry to part ways with this beautiful thing, but it just doesn't fit me.

评论概述: Strong material, but breathable and gorgeous!

Absolutely loved the color as well, it wasn’t too bright white but not yellowish either. Would buy again!

I love this blouse! It feels and looks much more expensive! Wear it under any sweater or blazer for a perfect touch!
I love the button-down; it fits true to size. Considering the price, I appreciate the quality.  I feel it’s a must have for your wardrobe

I purchased this to go with a pencil skirt for a mafia Style shoot. It is more "vintage" and so much cuter in person than it is in the pictures! Absolutely love the buttons!

Ordered a size 10 (label says 2XL) - even though Amazon said based on my measurements I should order a size 8. I saw this on an influencers page. Not something I normally would order, but the influencer styled it with so many things, I took a chance.  Its very pretty, not scratchy and the fabric feels silky. Runs small though. I had to return, because it was too small. Could JUST button it and the sleeves were short, there is no stretch. Length is good, and could be tucked in. Took a month to receive, so I'm not sure I will order a larger size. Super odd thing, my package was returned - I even used their printed label - it said it was undeliverable. I did receive my refund, and I ended up donating the blouse.
Good quality. Thick with lining. Fun for layering
Ordered medium runs a bit small so returned took several weeks to get amd was sent a 2XL which can not wear  super disappointing

I bought a size 6 and it was perfect. Even the sleeve length was just right. I am a volunteer usher at a performing arts center where our “uniform” consists of a white top and black pants. I wanted something different from my usual tailored shirt. This adds a nice, feminine touch and can be lovely with dress pants as well as jeans.
This blouse was exactly as described and fit just as expected. It was perfect for my Mary Poppin’s Halloween costume!

Purchased this for my Mary Poppins costume and wasn’t really expecting anything top of the line. This shirt is very well made, nice fabric and feels great on. I’ll wear it right the year but just as part of the costume. Read the size chart and go by measurements!!

评论概述: Nicest blouse I’ve seen in years!
评论详情: I haven’t worn this shirt yet, but when I tried it on it looks and fits beautifully! The buttons are pretty, as is the lacing and stitch work on the front. My favorite feature of this blouse is that there are darts in the back which make the shirt fit perfectly. Highly recommend.

This shirt is awesome. I ordered it for a Mary Poppins costume but I’ll be wearing it a lot. It fits me like it was tailored, which is crazy since it’s a random Amazon find. The fabric feels nice on my skin. It has just enough stretch that you can move your arms freely without it feeling tight across the bust, back, or arms themselves. The pretty pearl buttons are a plus. The shirt was shipped folded up in a small bag but all I see are a few creases along the lower arms so I’d say there’s no need to worry about wrinkles. The biggest part that blows my mind is the fabric is sheer, giving you that lacy Edwardian period feel, but apparently it’s not see through. I opened this package after I’d already put on my lounge-around clothes and was not intending on taking a picture so I didn’t bother to put a bra back on. I have an olive complexion, so on the darker side up there (sometimes you need TMI on a product review).  As you can see from my picture it is not obvious that I’m free winging it. Okay so ignore my shape because that does make it obvious, but that’s got nothing to do with the shirt. I’m over 50 and breastfed my children. That being said, I can tell that I will have no issues when I do have the girls in place. I hate it when a shirt gaps between buttons and I have to wear a tank or camisole underneath. I live it South Alabama for Pete’s sake where it’s generally 115 degrees with 102% humidity. That’s a big no thank you to layering. For reference I’m 5 ft 6 and weigh 155 lbs. On the regular I wear a 34D, size 8 pant & medium shirt. I ordered the size 12 and it’s perfect  I’m about to buy the black collared one as well.
I wear S/M but ended up getting size 8/XL. Good quality. Stretchy in the front. A bit see through so I'll have to wear skin color bra or undershirt. Love the style. As seen and expected.

Delighted with this purchase. Lightweight, dressy material, but lightly lined so as not to be too sheer. Fit perfectly. Even the sleeves. Very classy looking. I am 5'1", 105# and ordered a small. Usually the sleeves are too long for me on most smalls,...the fact that these were the perfect length may  mean they are too short on someone else.  Workmanship is good; buttons are nice.  Really happy with this blouse.
Professional looking blouse, soft fabric, good quality and true to size.

This is a very pretty blouse. It fits well and has washed and ironed nicely. The material is nice and soft and not too thin. I have problems with blouses not having long enough sleeves, but the sleeves on this blouse go  just beyond my wrist. I would recommend this blouse.

Lovely blouse. What I wanted for a special event.  Ordered Large.  I wear size 14.  This would not even meet at front and I am not full figured.  Suitable for a young girl.  Will try to return.  I had not opened upon receipt. Saving for a special event.  Didn't happen.
